document_data.name: Alek Lenter
document_data.mainbody: '''Alek Lenter''' was a member of the [[Xanathar Thieves' Guild]] in [[Skullport]] around [[1370 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Alek was a fence in [[Waterdeep]] before he was recruited by the [[Xanathar]] for his operations in [[Skullport]]. Alek, however, secretly spied on the Xanathar's Guild for his friends in the [[Shadow Thieves]], who wanted know all that happened in "their" city. Alek hoped to use this situation to gain as much money as possible. If he was caught, he would be killed.
